list_page_teaser: These politicians have written books that I have read and used to create images of their personalities.  Click to learn more!
description_html:
This gallery contains images of the personalities of established and up-and-coming politicians who have written at least one book.

The books are autobiographical in nature, and most of them are memoirs. All of them are personal accounts that give the reader a good sense of who the author is.

This gallery is a work in progress.

Check back for updates in a few days or weeks.

Thanks for your patience!

image_list.title: Donald Trump Jr.
image_list.subtitle_html: Eldest Son of Donald Trump
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Donald Trump Jr.'s spiritual portrait shows he is extremely decisive, cold, and pragmatic.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant personality trait, Thinking: objectivity; rationality; cool-headedness; very slight/moderate/strong preference for logic/reason/objectivity over emotion/empathy/subjectivity; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for the logical/rational/impersonal/objective over the emotional/irrrational/personal/subjective.

The Green in X's spiritual portrait represents their dominant personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for making logical/rational/impersonal/objective rather than emotional/irrrational/personal/subjective decisions; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for being/tendency to be logical/rational/impersonal/objective rather than emotional/irrrational/personal/subjective.
image_list.explain_dom_constant: In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_dom_very_slight_preference: It's important to note this preference/tendency is very slight, and X can be quite _____ in some situations/when the situation calls for it.
image_list.explain_aux: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents X's auxiliary personality trait, Sensing: pragmatism; pragmatic; practical; realism; realistic; outlook; openness to new experiences; very slight/moderate/strong preference for facts over ideas.

The Yellow in X's spiritual portrait represents their auxiliary personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for seeing the/tendency to see the world more in terms of facts rather than of ideas; need for sensual stimulation.
image_list.explain_aux_constant: In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_aux_very_slight_preference: It's important to note this preference is very slight, and X can be quite _____ in some situations/when the situation calls for it.
image_list.story_html: This spiritual portrait is based on _______.

image_list.title: Michael Bloomberg
image_list.subtitle_html: Co-founder of Bloomberg L.P.
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Michael Bloomberg's spiritual portrait shows he is outgoing, prefers to be rational and decisive, and has a slight tendency to be idealistic yet remains very well-grounded.  Click on the image to learn more!

image_list.title: Nikki Haley
image_list.subtitle_html: 29th Ambassador to the UN, From Jan. 25, 2017 to Dec. 31, 2018
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Nikki Haley's spiritual portrait shows she is outgoing, rational, and down-to-earth - but not overly so.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Nikki's dominant personality trait, her fairly strong tendency to be rational, objective, and cool-headed.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.  She demonstrates this trait by waiting twenty-four hours before before returning fire after being criticized for a decision, rather than responding in the heat of the moment.
image_list.explain_aux: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents Nikki's auxiliary personality trait, her pragmatic and realistic outlook.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.  She demonstrates this trait by working hard and focusing on what is in front of her, even though this can be extremely difficult after a tragic event such as the Mother Emanuel shootings.
image_list.story_html: This spiritual portrait is based on _______.

image_list.title: Stacey Abrams
image_list.subtitle_html: Minority Leader in Georgia's House of Representatives, From January 10, 2011 to July 1, 2017
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Stacey Abrams' spiritual portrait shows she is decisive, tends to be withdrawn, and has fairly mild tendencies to be logical and idealistic.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant personality trait, iNtuition: idealism and hope for the future; openness to new ideas; very slight/moderate/strong preference for ideas over facts; see the world through an idealistic lens.

The Blue in X's spiritual portrait represents their dominant personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for seeing/tendency to see the world more in terms of ideas than of facts; need for intellectual stimulation.

The Green in X's spiritual portrait represents their auxiliary personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for making logical/rational/objective rather than emotional/irrational/personal/subjective decisions; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for being/tendency to be more logical/rational/impersonal/objective rather than emotional/irrational/personal/subjective.

image_list.subtitle_html: US Senator From Texas, Jan. 3, 2013 to Present
